flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 227 books were taken, so there are 235 - 227= <<235-227=4>>4 books left.
56 books were brought back on Thursday, so there are 4 + 56 = <<4+56=60>>60 books in the library.
Finally, 35 books are taken out on Friday, leaving 60 - 35 = <<25=25>>25 books available.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
